import{makeAutoObservable}from"mobx";import{jwtDecode}from"jwt-decode";export default class UserStore{constructor(){this._isAuth=false;this._user={};makeAutoObservable(this);}checkValidToken(){// Изменяем на обычную функцию
let isExpired=true;const token=localStorage.getItem('token');if(token){const decodedToken=jwtDecode(token);const dateNow=new Date();if(decodedToken.exp>dateNow.getTime()){isExpired=false;}}return isExpired;}setIsAuth(bool){this._isAuth=bool;}setUser(user){this._user=user;}get isAuth(){return this._isAuth;}get user(){return this._user;}}
